meanings.definition: Descending below the surface of water or another liquid.
meanings.sent1: The sinking ship slowly disappeared beneath the waves.
meanings.sent2: The diver watched the sinking sun reflect on the water.
meanings.sent3: The sinking feeling of losing his favorite toy made Timmy pout.
meanings.sent4: Her sinking hopes were like a shipwreck in a stormy sea.
meanings.sent5: The sinking sensation in his stomach told him he was falling fast.

meanings.sent5: The sun was sinking below the horizon, painting the sky in hues of orange.
